a ship comes from Cybertron, heading for earth.....it contained the Gestalt=
 Team known as the Radicons.....unfortunently for them, the one who was dri=
ving was Train Wreck, the worst driver of the bunch. (how do you think he g=
ot his name?....) and they crashed on earth, their ship destroyed......it l=
anded right next to The People's Base....Dracona and plintissa ran outside,=
 weapons in hand, wondering what the explosion was....Stranato walked out o=
f the dust, coughing and cursing at Train Wreck....the Radicons walkeed out=
 of the ship, and noticed plintissa and Dracona.....in one quick motion, Ai=
rbomber knocked the guns from their hands!....Stranato, not giving plintiss=
a time to react, gave her a Sambo Suplex!... (he grabbed her by the shoulde=
r, with Plintissa's arm over his shoulder, and lifted her up and swung her =
around slamming her down, now you know what it is) Dracona tried firing her=
 ice beams, but Scamrock dodged and tackled her, punching away!....Airbombe=
r climbed to the top of the base and dove off with a Moonsault (back flip s=
plash) onto Dracona!...Plintissa still got no time to react as Train Wreck =
put her in a Neck Wrench!......the rather large Suukie stepped out of the b=
ase, dwarfing all of the Wrestling bots except for Stronghold...Suukie grab=
bed him by the arms and headbutted him! but it didn't last long as Arrow hi=
t a low blow on Suukie!...Stronghold picked up Suukie and gave him a Body P=
ress Slam......plintissa commanded the base to fire at them....and they did=
n't even know it was the base firing, thinking it was an inferior base....a=
ll of the Radicons lie defeated when Suukieblew himself up with a bomb, tak=
ing out the whole team....Dracona and plintissa, who avoided the blast, dru=
g the entire team and Suukie inside the base and ut them into the CR Chambe=
r...... "how many times are you going to get slagged!?..." Dracona said to =
Suukie as she loaded him into the CR Chamber..... "they don't know any bett=
er, they'll be on out side with a little...persuasion...." plintissa said..=
Dracona nodded and they went back to work, taking some of the bugs out of t=
he base and wondering about the Radicons, if they'll have respect or they'l=
l want revenge..Dracona didn't like the fact that Plintissa was healing thi=
s team that tried to kill them, but she had trust that plintissa knew what =
she was doing.......
